chunk:
Bambu Earth Tea Tree Facial Bar (2020 formulation)

Brand: Bambu Earth

Category: Facial Cleanser
book: 2685-Bambu Earth Tea Tree Facial Bar (2020 formulation)

chunk: Ingredients: Organic Extra Virgin Olive Oil, Organic Coconut Oil, Organic RSPO Certified Sustainable Palm Oil, Organic Raw Fair Trade Shea Butter, Organic Cocoa Butter, Avocado Oil, Bentonite Clay, Pink Kaolin Clay, Activated Bamboo Charcoal, Tea Tree Essential Oil, Lemongrass Essential Oil, Lemon Essential Oil, and Orange Essential Oil
book: 2685-Bambu Earth Tea Tree Facial Bar (2020 formulation)

chunk:
Directions: 1
Daily or weekly as a clarifying cleanser, scrub face with soft washcloth, loofah or hands.

2
Rinse.

3
Follow with Rosemary Toner and Petitgrain Moisturizer or Intense Hydration Cactus Concentrate.
book: 2685-Bambu Earth Tea Tree Facial Bar (2020 formulation)
